attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCC8R8enCYcAsYay75O_description
attribs.current:
[[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]]

These numbers may be arranged in any order.
If you dont like these stats you may do 27-point buy with this calculator: http://1-dot-encounter-planner.appspot.com/point-buy-calculator.html

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCC8zXWnXUzinvvkxqo_description
attribs.current:
Make a token on http://rolladvantage.com/tokenstamp/ upload the token as your character image, and change the character name with this format:

PC Name (Game ID)

This is so the character can be assigned to you and a token can be made even while you are offline. if you fail to follow these instructions the character will eventually get deleted.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LdMVvDMOa0t3E963ZYA_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d4, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 20/60

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LdMWnaA3bYCIWyJX1MP_description
attribs.current: Surprise Attack. If you surprise a creature and hit it with an attack on your first turn in combat, the attack deals an extra 2d6 damage to it. You can use this trait only once per combat.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LdMWxXtPD5hpWmqN8Uc_description
attribs.current: Powerful Build. You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LdMWzWQl53MD35NgjBE_description
attribs.current: Long-Limbed. When you make a melee attack on your turn, your reach for it is 5 feet greater than normal.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LdMX3RjGm4rNJnCaWu8_description
attribs.current: Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LdMY0hygyJlSZEXdT1y_itemcontent
attribs.current: Rope, whether made of hemp or silk, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.
